channel.title: Help with SYIpkpker
channel.description:
I know alot of u are going to say i jut need 2 code my server better or w/e,im working on it.Im working on a way to stop the Bot SYIpkpker but a way that worked on my serv to stop a person that was using the bot is:
i hate the syipkpker thingy. doesnt everyone? Als, if you try to ipban it, it can change it's ip or something like that. But, it doesn't change the first part of the ip. So, what you can do is block all ports from entering who's ip starts with a certain number sequence. For example, this is what i did on my server.
the syipkpker who was trying to connect to my server's ip was **.**.**.* so, in bannedips.txt, i type in: Code:
#1.#2*
here is another example. ip is: pool-*.**.**.**.*****.dsl-w.verizon.net:**** just do: Code:
pool-#1-#2-*
This will just block the one person trying to use the syipkpker bot.

M A R I N E C O D E:

the way i withstand it A>T>M is shutting server off for 10mins. And theres only 1 syipker

lol

@SonGoku wrote:

Two kid’s with the Syi program attacked my server. They were incompetnet and did not proxy. I contacted both of their ISP’s.
Get Dodian. my server is dodian and it withstood both atacks.

item.title: Help with SYIpkpker
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

I know alot of u are going to say i jut need 2 code my server better or w/e,im working on it.Im working on a way to stop the Bot SYIpkpker but a way that worked on my serv to stop a person that was using the bot is:

i hate the syipkpker thingy. doesnt everyone? Als, if you try to ipban it, it can change it’s ip or something like that. But, it doesn’t change the first part of the ip. So, what you can do is block all ports from entering who’s ip starts with a certain number sequence. For example, this is what i did on my server.

the syipkpker who was trying to connect to my server’s ip was ..**.*
so, in bannedips.txt, i type in:
Code:

#1.#2*

here is another example.
ip is: pool-....***.dsl-w.verizon.net:***
just do:
Code:

pool-#1-#2-*

This will just block the one person trying to use the syipkpker bot.

Read full topic
